Subject: Golden Chanterelle (Cantharellus californicus)
Habitat Notes: Under oak trees, buried under duff

Subject: Hedgehog Mushroom (Hydnum umbilicatum)
Recent Locations: ['Salt Point State Park', 'Orick, CA', 'Fort Bragg, CA', 'Inverness, CA', 'Jenner, CA', 'Jackson Demonstration State Forest', 'The Sea Ranch, CA', 'Gary Giacomini Open Space Preserve', 'Lagunitas-Forest Knolls, CA', 'Shasta-Trinity National Forest', 'Mill Valley, CA', 'Baltimore Canyon Open Space Preserve', 'Big Sur, CA', 'Willits, CA', 'Mendocino, CA', 'Arcata, CA']
Habitat Notes: Primarily found under Tanoak (Lithocarpus densiflorus) and Madrone (Arbutus menziesii), often in mixed hardwood/conifer forests. Also associated with Douglas fir (Pseudotsuga menziesii).

Subject: Black Trumpet (Craterellus cornucopioides)
Recent Locations: No specific public locations were found, but there are reports of finds in Northern California.
Habitat Notes: Found in association with broadleaf trees (beech mentioned) and in mossy areas.

Subject: King Bolete (Boletus edulis)
Habitat Notes: Found in damp, mixed coniferous/hardwood forests, particularly under redwood, fir, pine, and tanoak. Often on the forest floor.

Subject: Burn Morel (Morchella spp.)
Habitat Notes: Found in recent (2024) burn scars on North/East facing slopes with gentle grade. Soil should be moist with a mix of sun and shade.
